name: Explosive Mining
description:
Explosive Mining is a 2D mining game, where your goal is to mine resources under ground, to upgrade your gear, to be able to mine even more resources.

[CONTROLS]

  • A - Move right
  • D - Move left
  • S - Fall faster
  • S and W - to climb on vines
  • SPACE - Jump and jetpack
  • Q - Throw bomb
  • Q+S - Place Bomb on ground
  • RMB - pickup a bomb, press RMB again to throw it towards the mouse
  • F - Interact, with chests and other stuff, you can also roll gunpowder barrels with F by standing besides them.

FUN FACT: The whole level is made with bombs :)

This game was made in under 72 Hours for Mini Jam 32, the jams theme where Explosion. Explosions had to be a main mecanic.
